about_the_game:
If you're interested in learning more about the characters and their personalities in the game, this artbook is for you! Inside, you'll discover a mix of artwork created during development— some rough, polished, finished, or even abandoned. You'll also find developer comments, Easter Eggs, and development notes scattered throughout.

The artbook contains hints for unlocking the true ending and answers to hidden content, so we recommend exploring it after finishing the game!

The Artbook is available in English.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains depictions of mild blood, violence, and gore.
